::Hot Rod::

He fell as the chair connected with his leg.
"I've got to take out those weapons next time," he thought. He then
looked at referee hologram who wasn't doing anything. He then remembered
it was no DQ rules.
"Damn!"
He tryes to sweep Lyas legs out, and then crawls for his cornor, fast!
